thag4.4:5.1: Damn you mortal frame, you stink!
thag4.4:5.2: You’re on Māra’s side, you ooze!
thag4.4:5.3: O body, you have nine streams
thag4.4:5.4: that are flowing all the time.
thag4.4:6.1: Don’t think much of mortal frames;
thag4.4:6.3: They’re not even aroused by heaven,
thag4.4:7.1: But those who are stupid fools,
thag4.4:7.2: with bad advisors, shrouded in delusion,
thag4.4:7.3: that kind of person is aroused by bodies,
thag4.4:7.4: when Māra has laid down the snare.
thag4.4:8.1: Those whose greed, hate, and ignorance
thag4.4:8.3: such people are not aroused by bodies,
thag4.4:8.4: they’ve cut the strings, they’re no longer bound.
